about_the_game:
Outer Storms is a 3D survival and exploration game with a top-down view in which you play as a Kerrien. After a long space journey, your capsule crashes on an unknown planet where you must survive. You will need to gather resources and accumulate energy to upgrade your equipment and defend against the alien infection spreading across the universe.

Terraforming

  • Dynamic terraforming: The terrain reacts to energy and changes in real time around you.

  • Strategic terrain modifications: Transforming the ground generates plants that improve survival conditions and create safer zones.

  • Weakening of the infection: Terraforming helps push back the infection and makes certain areas safer for exploration.

Resource Management

  • Mining: Collect minerals to produce Kyrrite, a vital material for upgrading your capsule and exploration abilities.

  • Capsule upgrade: Use Kyrrite to upgrade your capsule into a highly sophisticated turret to reinforce your defense.

  • Resource management: Be mobile, as resources deplete and are necessary to maintain your equipment.

Mutations

  • Alien DNA exploitation: Collect DNA and create temporary but powerful mutations.

  • Infection: Learn to control the minds of aliens to make the most of difficult situations.

Survival, Exploration, and Colonization

  • Survival: Protect yourself from aliens attracted by your energy and adapt to the planet's extreme weather conditions.

  • Exploration: Venture into unexplored territories, unlock new zones, and discover ancient technologies.

  • Energy management: Harvest resources to accumulate energy and increase the power of your capsule.

  • Colonization: Terraform the land to rebuild your civilization.

  • Day/night cycle: Adapt your actions based on the light level; the environment and aliens are sensitive to it.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2300 | AMD FX-4350
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 660, 2 GB | AMD Radeon HD 7870, 2 GB
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Gamepad or Controller Recommended (Xbox and PS4 Natively Supported)
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8400 | AMD Ryzen 5 2600X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1060 | AMD Radeon RX 580
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Gamepad or Controller Recommended (Xbox and PS4 Natively Supported)

short_description: Survive the alien infection that has destroyed your civilization and is spreading across the universe. Explore a hostile world, extract resources, accumulate energy, exploit alien DNA, and terraform the infected lands. How long will you survive?
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Bulgarian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Korean, Danish, Spanish - Latin America, Finnish, Greek, Hungarian, Indonesian, Japanese, Norwegian, Dutch, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Romanian, Russian, Swedish, Czech, Thai, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese
